short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will turn all images on your browser into an iconic photo of Nicolas Cage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will turn all images on your browser into an iconic photo of Nicolas Cage. No more spoilers hidden in memes, no more annoying photos on your Facebook wall - just a sea of unblinking eyes and a smile.
